welcome_message_body: Welcome to Flagstaff, where the charm of a small mountain town meets the cultural richness of a college town. Known for its stunning natural beauty and vibrant arts scene, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Flagstaff has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pulliam Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Pulliam Field Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network to stay connected during their travels.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sedona Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Sedona Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
